long_description: specialists in quartz, marble, dekton, neolith, granite and other stone work surfaces. we are a team of ambitious stone fabricators with over 40years of collective industry experience fitting granite all over the uk, both commercial and residential. surrey based suppliers and installers of the highest quality granite, marble and quartz worktops. collectively they have over 40years in the granite industry. we are creating living space for people, this is much more than just business. as installation engineers and stone masons we love what we do. we love seeing the difference that we can make to a customer's enjoyment of their home. taking our trade seriously has been part of success and growth. to sum up, elliott stone works is about excellence.
